== Bernd ==

 Hello, I'm Bernd from Austria. I work as software developer in a big company in Austria. In my work I'm using oracle-databases, SQL, PL/SQL, Oracle Forms, Oracle Reports, Perl, XML,....
 In my free time I am working with Ubuntu on my own computers. Moreover I am a member of the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/AustriaTeam|austrian Ubuntu-Team]]</nowiki>. 
 I am also interested in <nowiki>[[http://www.djangoproject.com|Django]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.python.org/|Python]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://www.openstreetmap.org|OpenStreetMap]]</nowiki>
